sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个地方充满了神秘感。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège dìfāng chōngmǎn le shénmì gǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet endroit est plein de mystère.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This place is full of mystery.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Enfreindre les règles entraîne une amende.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Violating the rules will result in a fine.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On dit qu'il va pleuvoir demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It is said that it will rain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les soldats s'entraînent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The soldiers are training.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En hiver, il faut porter des gants pour se réchauffer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In winter, you should wear gloves to keep warm.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce canapé est très confortable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This sofa is very comfortable.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son bras est blessé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His arm is injured.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les gens font exploser des pétards pendant le Nouvel An chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: People set off firecrackers during Chinese New Year.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il semble très fatigué.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He seems very tired.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Peut-être qu'il est déjà arrivé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Maybe he has already arrived.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je l'ai finalement convaincu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I finally persuaded him.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les déchets doivent être triés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Garbage should be sorted.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā míngmíng dāyìng le, què méi lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il avait clairement promis, mais il n'est pas venu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He clearly promised, but he didn't come.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La photographie est son hobby.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Photography is his hobby.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 新技术缩短了生产时间。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīn jìshù suōduǎn le shēngchǎn shíjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nouvelle technologie a réduit le temps de production.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: New technology has shortened production time.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez réduire un peu l'image.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please make the picture smaller.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要分析这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons analyser ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to analyze this problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'avion a atterri en toute sécurité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The plane landed safely.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Attention aux marches, ne tombe pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Be careful of the steps, don't fall.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是这种动物的主要特征。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì zhè zhǒng dòngwù de zhǔyào tèzhēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est la principale caractéristique de cet animal.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is the main characteristic of this animal.
